text: Jón Sigurðsson may refer to: *Jón Sigurðsson (1811–1879), the leader of the 19th century Icelandic independence movement. *Jón Sigurðsson (politician, born 1941), an Icelandic politician and former minister. *Jón Sigurðsson (politician, born 1946), an Icelandic politician and former minister.. *Jón Sigurðsson (basketball) (born 1951), an Icelandic former basketball player and coach. *Jón Karl Sigurðsson (born 1932), Icelandic Olympic skier
title: Jón Sigurðsson (disambiguation)
